title: Kick-off
description: Football is really happening! Steven Hauschka kicks off to start up Super Bowl XLIX

title: Interception!
description: Brady is throwing as hes stepping backwards - never a good idea - and hes picked off at the goal line! Jeremy Lane makes the play and theres the first turnover of the game!

title: End of the 1st quarter
description: First quarter is over already. The Patriots dominated time of possession - 11:07 to 3:37 but thanks to that pick theyve got nothing to show for it

title: Touchdown!
description: Brady finds LaFell who makes a little move towards the post and hes in the endzone! New England strike first!

title: Touchdown!
description: Marshawn Lynch is a pinball - bouncing off Darrelle Revis before finding the endzone! Thats a 70 yards drive on eight plays in 4:51

title: Touchdown!
description: Brady throws to Gronkowski in the endzone. New England take the lead with time running down in the half!

title: Touchdown!
description: Wilson hits Matthews on the near side - hes in the endzone! TD in only 00:31!!!

title: Field Goal!
description: Hauschka is good from 27 and Seattle have their first lead of the night

title: Interception!
description: 3rd & 9...Brady has time but Wagner steps in front of Gronkowski and takes it away! His second interception of the game!

title: Touchdown!
description: Wilson makes a play fake to Lynch and Doug Baldwin is wide open - all alone in the endzone!

title: End of the 3rd quarter
description: End of a big quarter for Seattle

title: Touchdown!
description: Brady finds Amendola in the back of the endzone - this is a three point game!!

title: Punt
description: Wilson throws it away and Seattle have to punt

title: Touchdown!
description: Blount - a run for two yards - and then Edelman is open in the endzone!!!

title: Big Pass!
description: Wilson throws downfield - incomplete to Kearse - WAIT - NO IT ISNT! Kearse was on his back with the ball in the air and he was able to make the catch! 1st & goal for the Seahawks!

title: Interception!
description: Wilson on the Pats one-yard line - he throws it and it's intercepted! Malcolm Butler makes the catch that wins the superbowl!

title: Final Whistle!
description: After a dramatic finish the Patriots are superbowl champions!
